content: this legal text provides an update on a divorce case between mr x and mrs y the couple had previously divided their joint property through a notarized deed with a specific property being allocated to mrs y the divorce has now been finalized by a court judgment and the property officially belongs to mrs y the value of the property for tax purposes has been determined in this text it is stated that ms owes a onetime lumpsum payment to mr x which has been paid and acknowledged by mr x the parties confirm that they have settled all personal claims and no longer have any obligations towards each other the registration of the transaction has been completed and tax statements have been addressed the costs and fees related to the transfer of property will be shared by both parties the parties may request a reduced tax rate for the division of assets the notary certifies the identities of the parties and informs them of their rights and obligations the document concludes with the parties signing the deed in the presence of a notary
